questions.text: A 22-year-old pregnant female comes for MTP on grounds of failure of contraceptive. What is correct about this.

options.label: B
options.text: Termination can be done on court order

options.label: C
options.text: Opinion of two doctors has to be taken

questions.correct_answer: A. One doctors opinion is sufficient

questions.text: A farmer is brought to the emergency department with the history of snake bite over the dorsum of right foot. The doctor noted two fang marks on foot with mild pain, swelling and bleeding at bite site. What will be the immediate step of management.

options.label: B
options.text: Look for dead snake brought by relatives

options.label: C
options.text: Use sling or splint for right lower limb immobilization

questions.correct_answer: C. Use sling or splint for right lower limb immobilization

A forensic expert received summon from district court to record his evidence in a criminal case but 2 days back, he already received a summon for civil case in district court for same date. What should the doctor do?

options.label: A
options.text: Inform the both courts and wait

options.label: B
options.text: Attend court for which summon came first

questions.correct_answer: C. Attend court for criminal case
